page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT, HASELOR, WARKS.
page.content: As we know there are no factories in Haselor we were interested to know how far people travelled to work.We asked on the survey: How many work a)within 02 miles of home b)between 02 and 05 miles c)between 05 and 10 miles d)over 10 miles Here are the results: a)00 to 02miles * 06 * b)02 to 05miles * 05 * c)05 to 10miles * 06 * d)over 10 miles * 12 * We realised that most people had to travel to work. The only work we could think of that was done in the village was farm work and dinner ladies at the school, with some ladies doing cleaning jobs in some of the larger houses.
